This page lists the DocumentationTeam's main objectives for the Oneiric development cycle leading to the release of Ubuntu 11.10.

''Some objectives remain at a brainstorming stage and are under discussion <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-doc/2011-April/015691.html|in this thread]]</nowiki> on the ubuntu-doc mailing list.''
